title: Ultimate Announcers Bundle
description: +8K phrases (~19K files TOTAL with effects) of 8 different male and female announcers for RTS, MOBA, FPS, Sci-fi, Fighting, Casual, Mobile, Puzzle, Casino games etc.
longDescription:
[ REAL HUMAN VOICE ACTORS - NO AI USE ALLOWED ]


Combat Announcer: Effect | No Effect ||| List of Phrases

Casual App Positive Male: Audio Preview ||| List of phrases

Casual App Serious Male: Audio Preview ||| List of phrases

Casual App Female: Audio Preview ||| List of phrases

AI Male: Original | Echo | Robotic ||| List of Phrases

AI British Male: Original | Echo | Robotic ||| List of Phrases

AI Female: Original | Echo | Robotic ||| List of Phrases

AI British Female: Original | Echo | Robotic ||| List of Phrases


This bundle includes the following packs:

Combat Game Male Voice Announcer

Casual App Positive Male Voice Announcer

Casual App Serious Male Voice Announcer

Casual App Female Voice Announcer

Military AI Male Voice Announcer

Military AI British Male Voice Announcer

Military AI Female Voice Announcer

Military AI British Female Voice Announcer


NEED only parts of this mega pack? CHECK our Casual App Announcer Bundle & Military AI Announcer Bundle


THE ULTIMATE BUNDLE pack of male and female ANNOUNCERS, recorded by real human voice actors, covers everything you need for your next projects.

This pack includes a Combat Announcer, Casual App Announcers and Military AI Announcers.

In addition to the original sound,several packs include different versions with effects applied to them.

+ That's 18960 files TOTAL! 6.5 hours of sound!! +

This way you can use them as they are or apply any effect you desire to the original files.

The bundle can be used for a vast variety of games such as:

RTS, MOBA, FPS, Sci-fi, Apocalyptic, Fighting games, Close Combat, Puzzles, Matching, Quests, Board games, Educational, Casino, Sports, Card games and more.

They can also be used for animation, videos, etc.

These unique royalty-free phrases were carefully mixed and mastered to match your project.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 8 different voice packs in one bundle, a GREAT DEAL!
  • 8148 files or a TOTAL of 18960 files with effects applied.
  • Some packs includes different versions: Original, Echo or Robotic.
  • The packs are divided by categories for easy access.
  • Top quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.


* FOR THE CATEGORIES LIST PLEASE REFER TO EACH INDIVIDUAL PACK (LINKS ABOVE) OR YOUTUBE DESCRIPTION
